task.title: Installing Browser Setup Script and Logging in

taskbody.context: Before logging in to Acme Eye for the first time, you need to install Acme Eye Browser Setup Script. To install Acme Eye Browser Setup Script, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download Acme Eye Browser Setup Script from the Acme webpage: https://sales.acme.com
Close all applications, including Outlook, and web browsers before installing Acme Eye Browser Setup Script.
Double-click on Acme Eye Browser Setup Script executable file (.exe) to run the script.
Log in to Acme Eye with your single sign-on credentials from the Acme Eye link: https://eye.acme.com

taskbody.result: When you log in to Acme Eye, the Welcome Screen is displayed.
